scenario: The modular data centers market is forecasted to grow by USD 42.56 billion during 2023-2028, accelerating at a CAGR of 19.8%. This growth is driven by the implementation of software-defined modular data centers, reducing complexity of traditional data centers, rapid deployment of modular data centers, and growing data economy globally. Key vendors in the market include Amazon.com Inc., Microsoft Corp., Cisco Systems Inc., and Dell Technologies Inc. The report also highlights the importance of green data centers and modern infrastructure solutions in driving market demand. Microsoft Corp is listed as one of the key vendors in the report.
